website_summaries.verdict: The Revel 3 has been received quite well. Those who have tested this Brooks running shoe are generally happy with what it has to offer. The underfoot cushioning system is touted to be comfortable and responsive while the weight is deemed light enough for daily use. The shoe’s adequately plush platform gives suitability for mid-distance runs.Fans of road running shoes are the ones who are likely to enjoy what the Brooks Revel 3 has to offer.
pros: The midsole unit of the Brooks Revel 3 is lauded for allowing the foot to move through the stride with relative ease
Several testers have noted that the quality of the cushioning system is robust and accommodating for all-day support
The weight of this shoe has been deemed by many testers to be suitably light for their daily runs
Some consumers claim that the fit profile of the Brooks Revel 3 is accurate
A couple of runners notice the forefoot being wide enough to accommodate the natural splaying of the toes
The upper unit has gained some fans for offering a wrap that is secure yet flexible
cons: A few people note that the fabrics of the upper have worn down after only a few uses
Based on a handful of reviews, the in-shoe experience is a bit restrictive

customer_reviews.title: Brooks great shoes for me.
customer_reviews.text: I started competitive road running middle long distance when I was 40 years old,back in the 1980's, my first pair of running shoes were Brooks, and I have worn them ever since, I am now approaching 79, and regrettably dont run as fast or as far as I did all those years ago, however I still wear Brooks, because for me I know what I am getting for my money, a good well made shoe that I feel comfortable in.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie Lad.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I walk around a great deal and for as long as I can remember I have had terrible issues with my feet, blisters, dead skin buildup, bunions, friction on the hell, painful shin splints, ingrown nails. No matter what footwear I used the problems persisted. Since using Brooks as my walking shoes I’ve had no problems whatsoever, comfortable, no friction, no blisters. Would recommend these to anyone and everyone, I will be using them for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Harbour

customer_reviews.title: Revel 3
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with The revel 3, had the revel 2 and was very happy with them, the revel 3 has a little less room in in toe but fits good, gave them a good test walking and they pass the test
customer_reviews.author: Dermot Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, gave me leg injury
customer_reviews.text: Despite being comfortable and fitting well these shoes ruined my legs. I had a pair of Revel 2 previously, bought the Revel 3 thinking they were an upgrade. I ended up with shin-splints, itb issues and now really sore knees. Get yourself to a running specialist shop and get yourself measured/gait analysed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers. So comfortable! In my case a full size larger than street shoes seems to be the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous support - super comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great support and feel great after long walks/runs. Wear well - good value for money. Get yourself fitted properly before buying online but afterwards it's super convenient to buy online.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Daly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for runners both on the treadmill and on the pavement. Comfortable straight away, no need to break them in. Lightweight and stylish
customer_reviews.author: E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Super confortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting every version of the revel shoe ever since i tried the original version as it is so comfortable and worked for me !
customer_reviews.author: Siurell

customer_reviews.title: I hate answering surveys
customer_reviews.text: The clue is in the name after all they are running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nero

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very long delivery delay
customer_reviews.text: Trainers were as expected as bought before.....unfortunately delivery took several weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vigar

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fitting shoe. looks good in gym and as a casual shoe
customer_reviews.author: Skelly

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Revel 3 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: A fresh new look. The revisitation of the flat-knit upper gives this shoe a completely new look and feel\nperceived even beyond The race. Comfortable fit. Enjoy the secure fit of an inner foot that wraps around the foot, for comfort that lasts all day thanks to thermo-adhesive yarns that activate and do not lose their elasticity over time. Soft cushioning. Our exclusive patented biomogo dna cushioning adapts to your stride, your weight and your speed. Why? To protect yourself by removing the impact from the body. Normal plant.
feature_bullets: THIS SHOE IS FOR: Neutral runners looking for a shoe that looks good and performs even better. This is a true do-it-all shoe that you can also wear casually.
BALANCED, SOFT CUSHIONING: BioMoGo DNA cushioning adapts to your stride, weight, and speed to help protect you by deflecting impact away from your body.
SOFT, COMFORTABLE, AND VERSATILE FIT: Enjoy the secure fit of an inner bootie that surrounds your foot in all-day comfort thanks to heat-activated yarns that won’t stretch out over time.
FRESH LOOK: The redesigned flat-knit upper and midsole provide a look and feel that’s perfect for work, working out, or post-work activities.
WEAR TESTERS SAY: "Shoe feels great. It’s got a nice smooth ride with the right amount of cushioning. Shoe feels pretty light."
